original: 回復時間：$Skill_CD(2706)@在武將四周，召喚出18名解煩兵，攻擊附近的敵人。解煩兵屬性體力值：$Soldier_HP(1271)@武力值：$Soldier_Str(1271)@
text: Response time:  $Skill_CD(2706)@ Around the generals, 18 trouble-relief soldiers were summoned to attack nearby enemies. Trouble-free soldier attribute physical strength:  $Soldier_HP(1271)@武力值:  $Soldier_Str(1271)@
